description: Number of numbers <= n with same prime factors as n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
P. Erdős, T. Motzkin, Problem 5735, Amer. Math. Monthly, 78 (1971), 680-681. (Incorrect solution!)
H. N. Shapiro, Problem 5735, Amer. Math. Monthly, 97 (1990), 937.
mathematica: PkTbl=Prepend[ Array[ Times @@ First[ Transpose[ FactorInteger[ # ] ] ]&, 100, 2 ], 1 ];1+Array[ Count[ Take[ PkTbl, #-1 ], PkTbl[ [ # ] ] ]&, Length[ PkTbl ] ]
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_, _Olivier Gérard_
